automatable.title: Automatable
automatable.titleDescription: Can an attacker reliably automate creating exploitation events for this vulnerability?

no.name: No
no.valueDescription: No: Attackers cannot reliably automate steps 1-4 of the kill chain for this vulnerability. These steps are (1) reconnaissance, (2) weaponization, (3) delivery, and (4) exploitation.

yes.name: Yes
yes.valueDescription: Yes: Attackers can reliably automate steps 1-4 of the kill chain.

exploitation.title: Exploitation
exploitation.titleDescription: The present state of exploitation of the vulnerability.

none.name: None
none.valueDescription: None: There is no evidence of active exploitation and no public proof of concept (PoC) of how to exploit the vulnerability.

public_poc.name: Public PoC
public_poc.valueDescription: Public PoC: One of the following is true: (1) Typical public PoC exists in sources such as Metasploit or websites like ExploitDB; or (2) the vulnerability has a well-known method of exploitation.

active.name: Active
active.valueDescription: Active: Shared, observable, reliable evidence that the exploit is being used in the wild by real attackers; there is credible public reporting.
